name: LogisticsNetworks Guide
landing_text: A guide to setting up and using LogisticsNetworks. Place nodes on containers, group them into networks, and move items, fluids, and energy between them automatically.$(br)Need help or want updates? Join the Discord: $(l:https://discord.gg/xTeHR2tdYh)discord.gg/xTeHR2tdYh$().$(br2)This book is a work in progress.
